description: Home/apartment settings for SaveYourPet image generation. Random selection adds variety to slides while maintaining cozy pet-owner aesthetic.

settings.name: Cozy Bedroom
settings.description: cozy bedroom with unmade bed, soft white sheets, fairy lights on wall, warm ambient lighting
settings.lighting: warm golden hour light through sheer curtains mixed with soft lamp light

settings.name: Living Room Couch
settings.description: modern living room, sitting on comfortable couch, throw blanket, houseplants visible
settings.lighting: natural daylight from large windows, soft shadows

settings.name: Kitchen Counter
settings.description: bright modern kitchen, leaning against counter or sitting on counter, casual morning vibe
settings.lighting: bright natural morning light, clean and fresh

settings.name: Bathroom Mirror Selfie
settings.description: modern bathroom, mirror selfie, clean aesthetic, getting ready vibe
settings.lighting: bright vanity lighting, flattering and even

settings.name: Home Office/Desk
settings.description: aesthetic home office setup, sitting at desk or in desk chair, modern workspace
settings.lighting: natural window light from side, soft and productive

settings.name: Bedroom Floor
settings.description: sitting on bedroom floor against bed, casual and intimate, cozy carpet or rug
settings.vibe: lazy day at home, grounded and relaxed

settings.name: Balcony/Terrace Golden Hour
settings.description: small apartment balcony during golden hour, plants, city or nature view in background
settings.lighting: golden hour sunlight, warm orange glow, backlit

settings.name: Lying in Bed
settings.description: lying in bed looking up at camera, cozy blankets, morning or evening mood
settings.lighting: soft side lighting from window or lamp, intimate
settings.vibe: lazy morning in bed, just woke up energy

settings.name: Walk-in Closet/Dressing Area
settings.description: in front of closet or dressing area, clothes visible behind, getting dressed vibe

settings.name: Reading Nook/Window Seat
settings.description: cozy window seat or reading corner, blanket, looking contemplative
settings.lighting: beautiful natural window light, soft and dreamy

settings.name: Dining Area
settings.description: sitting at dining table or breakfast bar, casual meal moment
settings.lighting: warm overhead pendant light mixed with natural light

settings.name: Hallway/Entrance Mirror
settings.description: full-length mirror in hallway or entrance, checking outfit, about to leave vibe
settings.lighting: natural light from entrance, transitional space
settings.vibe: ready to go out, quick mirror check
